item.title: The red dragon will lead the way
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_736” align=“aligncenter” width=“576”] The Pierhead building in Cardiff Bay[/caption] Always wanted to see the capital of Wales but always ended up just drive pass it on the M4. The closest I ever got to the actual city centre was to visit the local Ikea store while I was still in the process of furnishing my small flat in Haverfordwest. Here are some more detailed instructions for those who might want to see it also but don’t know how to get there.
